parameter.name: config_1_2
parameter.label: 1: Rain Counter
parameter.description: Ths values shows the total count of rain from the moment of inclusion in mm waterlevel. By writing this value this counter can be reset. Size: 2 Byte, Default Value: 0

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Rain Start Command
parameter.description: This BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 2 when the device detects start of rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 99

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Rain Stop Command
parameter.description: This BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 2 when the device detects stop of rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 0

parameter.name: config_4_2
parameter.label: 4: Meter Multiplier
parameter.description: This multiplier allows to adapt the display to certain controllers not being able to handle very low numbers. Size: 2 Byte, Default Value: 1 only 1/10/100/1000

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Heavy Rain
parameter.description: This threshold defines when a heavy rain condition is hit. In most countries this is defined as > 15 mm rain per hour. The default value however is to turn this function off. Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 255

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Heavy Rain Start Command
parameter.description: This BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 3 when the device detects start of heavy rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 99

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Heavy Rain Stop Command
parameter.description: This BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 3 when the device detects stop of heavy rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 0

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Switching Command when Rain (> 0 mm/h)
parameter.description: Switching Command when Rain (> 0 mm/h). Basic Set Comand is sent.

parameter.name: group_3
parameter.label: 3: Heavy Rain detected. Basic Set Comand is sent.
